This is correct behavior since we updated the format.  Perhaps we should stop including the exception in the log entry?

Oh, I see -- I thought the exception occurred as a *result* of the update, since the recreating messages is separated from the stack trace.  Why is MylarStatusHandler.fail(...) tacking on a newline to the messages?
Please ignore this comment.  I'm trying to trace why submitting from the bugzilla editor seems to be cause a hang on Linux.
Never mind, it seems to work fine for me now.
